entities.description: A specific category within the survey responses, indicating unique response values.
The number of occurrences of each response category within the survey data.
The percentage representation of each response category within the total survey data.
The amount of data that is missing or unrecorded in the survey responses.
The total number of valid cases and total cases in the survey.
Descriptive statistics of the survey data including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of times a specific response category was recorded.
Indicates the percentage of occurrences a specific response category represents within the total survey data.
Specifies the amount of data that is missing or unrecorded in the survey.
Specifies the total number of valid cases in the survey data.
Provides descriptive statistics of the survey data including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
